label: applicableAgriculturalProcess
comment: An agricultural process crop production applicable for this field crop.
An agricultural process crop production specified for this crop plot.

rangeIncludes.comment: A practice of cultivating land, raising crops, or treatment of the agricultural produce.

domainIncludes.comment: A field with one or more cultivated plants or produce from one or more botanical species or varieties.
A small piece of land or water used for a crop such as an agricultural or aquacultural crop.
